CmdLine: apt-get update 	&& apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends software-properties-common 	&& add-apt-repository -y ppa:git-core/ppa 	&& apt-get update 	&& apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 		bzip2 		ca-certificates 		curl 		file 		fonts-dejavu-core 		g++ 		git 		libz-dev 		locales 		make 		openssh-client 		patch 		sudo 		uuid-runtime 		tzdata 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: localedef -i en_US -f UTF-8 en_US.UTF-8 	&& useradd -m -s /bin/bash linuxbrew 	&& echo 'linuxbrew ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' >>/etc/sudoers
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 	&& mkdir -p bin etc include lib opt sbin share var/homebrew/linked Cellar 	&& ln -s ../Homebrew/bin/brew /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/ 	&& cd /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/Homebrew 	&& git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS=1 HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 brew tap homebrew/core 	&& chown -R linuxbrew: /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 	&& chmod -R g+w,o-w /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 	&& rm -rf ~/.cache
Commands.Name: run
